name: Hassliebe - The Good and The Cat
name_original: Hassliebe - The Good and The Cat
description:
Face a series of micro levels, carrying your teammate, Peter, to the end of the level. Holding him will limit your movements, and leaving him behind isn't an option. Jump, pick up Peter and throw him until you reach the exit!

Story

You find yourself in a strange dungeon, and no one other than a boy, Peter, is around. You decide to get out of that place, even though you're forced to carry Peter with you.

Keep in mind!

If you die, the room will reload immediately. Don't be afraid of failures, but accept them to improve! :)

Still, if it is too hard, Chill Mode is available, which consists in assisted throws! Give it a shot if you find a level too hard

Controls
  1. Move with arrow keys
  2. Confirm/Jump with "C"
  3. Pick up/throw Peter with "X"
  4. Skip dialogue with "S"
  5. Pause using "ESC"

Also, you can use "Left CTRL" to lock your aim when holding Peter

Enjoy! :)

If you'd like to share your scores or feedback, feel free to do so!
